rules_text:
Choose one –
• Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.
• Target creature makes an experience check. [i](Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than that creature’s power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
Entwine–Tap an untapped creature you control. [i](Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)[/i]
